title: Yes, These Incredibly Stylish Jeans Are All Available on Amazon
description: And the world will never know you used Prime shipping to get them.
excerpt: If you need a new pair of denim blues, we've rounded up the best jeans on Amazon for women, including brands like Paige, Rag & Bone, Good American and more.

html:
High-Rise Sculpting Boot Cut

DL1961 Bridget Boot High Rise Instasculpt Jeans

Not only does DL1961 make some of the softest denim out there, but this pair actually cinches you in at the waist, so you’ll feel extra snatched in them.

Sizes: 23-32

Colors: Admiral

Material: 93% cotton, 6% polyester, 1% lycra spandex

Best Jean Sweatpants

Rag & Bone Miramar Sofie Sweatpants

At first glance, these might seem like regular jeans, but they’re actually sweatpants (!). You’ll want to wear them on days when you truly don’t want to get dressed (i.e., that red-eye flight). They have tons of stretch and are made with 100 percent cotton.

Sizes: 23-32

Colors: Kimber Was

Material: 100% Cotton

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Mid-Rise Boot Cut

True Religion Becca Mid-Rise Bootcut Jean

If you never gave up a skinny-leg jean after 2010, then you’ll love this more modern version of the throwback style.

Sizes: 23-34

Colors: Indigo Upgrade, Indigo Heritage, Optic White

Material: 55% Cotton, 23% Rayon, 20% Polyester, 2% Elastane

Customer review: “They are exactly as photographed and the value for the money was incredible. They fit true to size and I got so many compliments on them when I wore them with cowboy boots. They do have a little stretch which makes them comfortable. The material is high quality. I would highly recommend.”

Light-Wash Wide Leg

Veronica Beard Crosbie Wide-Leg Jeans

This light-wash pair of jeans has a softened hand, which means they’ll already feel like they’ve been broken in—and who doesn’t love that?

Colors: Amethyst

Sizes: 23-32

Material: 92% cotton, 6% elastomultiester, 2% polyurethane

Customer review: “Very flattering jeans, I love mine, they fit perfect. Love the high waist and leg width.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Grey Wide Leg

Hudson James High-Rise Wide Leg

Everyone should own a pair of wide-leg jeans in grey. Since they’re neutral they look fantastic with any color or pattern you style them with.

Sizes: 23-34

Colors: 6 options

Material: 99% Cotton, 1% Spandex

Customer review: “Some of my favorite jeans I’ve bought! I’m 5‘5 and these hit right at the floor without dragging (hate having to always have things hemmed). Truly the perfect jean for loafer/flat and boots/heels! Was super skeptical to purchases, but they are so flattering and so worth it! Already looking at other colors.”

Cropped Jeans

MOTHER The Insider Crop Step Fray Jeans

Not only are cropped jeans a fun twist to add to your regular rotation, but they’re a great way to show off a statement shoe.

Sizes: 23-29

Colors: Off Limits

Material: 94% cotton, 5% polyester, 1% elastane

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Slightly Distressed

Paige Sasha Wide-Leg Jeans

If you’ve been on the hunt for a pair of standard jeans with slight whiskering and distressing without looking too daring, you’ll love this style from Paige.

Colors: Modernism

Sizes: 24-34

Material: 99% cotton, 1% polyurethane

Cargo Jeans

Good American Jeanius Good Skate Cargo Jeans

Good American is lauded for having one of the best size ranges available, and its denim truly lives up to the word “good.” Cargo pants have been everywhere for the last few seasons, and this pair of jeans is a playful take on the trend.

Sizes: 2-20

Colors: Indigo

Material: 100% Cotton

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Japanese Denim

Moussy Vintage Mv Ridgefield Straight-Low Jeans

Moussy Vintage is renowned for its coveted denim, with Japanese craftsmanship that shines through in the exceptional fit and quality of each pair, including these straight-leg jeans.

Sizes: 24-32

Colors: Blue

Material: 100% Cotton

Cropped Straight Leg

Anine Bing Vin Jeans

Anine Bing is the epitome of cool-girl style, and these jeans are a perfect reflection of that. They strike the ideal balance between refined and relaxed, offering a versatile look that exudes the idea of effortless chic.

Sizes: 26-32

Colors: Washed Blue

Material: 100% Cotton

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Dark-Wash Boot Cut

Hudson Barbara High-Rise Bootcut Fashion Jean

Dark-wash denim makes every outfit feel instantly more polished.

Sizes: 23-34

Colors: 15 options

Material: 57% Cotton, 37% Modal, 4% Elastomultiester, 2% Elastane

Customer review: “These jeans are both comfy and flattering which is not an easy combo to find. They are true to size but do stretch a bit after you wear them. They will shrink a bit in the dryer, but stretch back out in the waist. The price was really good for Hudson jeans! Felt lucky to have found them. They also look good casual or dressy.”

Classic Levi’s 501

Levi’s 501 Original Fit Jeans

Of all the jeans out there, none are as beloved as the Levi’s 501. They’ve been a part of American fashion for over 150 years and are known for lasting years.

Sizes: 23-32

Colors: 9 options

Material: 100% Cotton

Customer review: “I treated myself, glad I did, I really do love and appreciate that they haven't changed! Classic jeans, great quality and they just get better and better as you wear them. Probably the most perfect jeans ever.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Sustainable Denim

Madewell Kick Out Crop Jeans

A pair of cropped jeans that you’ll feel good about, this pair features regenerative-certified sustainable cotton fibers that are intended to help restore the natural ecosystem and support farms across the supply chain.

Sizes: 23-33

Colors: Oneida Wash

Material: 97% Cotton, 3% Elastane

Non-Stretch

Pistola Denim Cassie Jeans

While this pair of non-stretch denim may take a little time to break in, its durability means they’ll last you for years to come.

Sizes: 24-31

Colors: By My Side

Material: 77% cotton, 23% rayon

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

High-Rise Flare Jeans

Gap High-Rise Flare Jeans Dark Wash

Flared jeans not only accentuate curves in the best possible way, but they also highlight your shoes, making them a win-win.

Sizes: 24-32

Colors: Dark wash, medium wash

Material: 100% Cotton

Customer review: “Great fitting and not too long. Waiting for them to be available in the lighter color.”

High-Rise Subtle Flare

Mavi Maria High-Rise Boot Cut Flare Jeans

The softer side of flared jeans will still feel cool without overtaking the rest of your outfit.

Sizes: 24-32

Colors: Mid Brushed Blue

Material: Cotton

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Low Rise

HUDSON Kelli Low-Rise Loose Fit Straight Leg Jean

If you've been curious about revisiting a less intimidating version of low-rise jeans, this pair from Hudson is the perfect place to start.

Colors: 6 colors

Sizes: 23-32

Material: 100% Cotton

Customer review: “I’m so pleased to discover that with such an upscale brand, the basic blue jean is reinterpreted to be a thing of beauty: perfect fit, perfect styling, and made so well they’ll look perfectly almost anywhere...it all depends on how you build and accessorize the rest of you outfit to suit the occasion.”

Best Petite Jeans

Joe's Mia Petite High-Rise Wide-Leg Jean

These wide-leg jeans are specifically designed for petite frames, meaning you won’t have to worry about hemming them when they arrive, they'll fit just right out of the box.

Colors: 9 color options

Sizes: 23P-34PMaterial: 63% Cotton, 35% Lyocell, 2% Elastane

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Plus Size Tapered Jeans

Lauren Ralph Lauren Plus Size Relaxed Tapered Ankle Jeans

Tapered jeans are a wardrobe staple, offering a versatile style that can easily be dressed up or down for any occasion.

Sizes: 14 Plus-22 Plus

Colors: Empire Black

Material: 99% Cotton, 1% Elastane

Slim Straight Leg

AG Jeans Mari Mid Rise Slim Straight Jean

This straight-leg jean offers a flattering mid-rise fit that comfortably hugs the hips, with a slim opening at the ankle. These versatile jeans are perfect for pairing with everything from casual T-shirts to your most treasured cashmere sweaters.

Sizes: 23-33

Colors: 8 options

Material: 98% Cotton, 2% Elastane
